body.name: Lville Kids Tablet 7 inch, Android 12 Tablet for Kids,IPS HD Display,Dual Camera,Kidoz Preinstalled,Parental Control Tablets (Pink)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 44 mins
features: 【Learning Toddler Tablet】Tablet for toddlers provides a series of age-appropriate and up-to-date fun content, including math, animation, An educational app for drawing and fun games. You also can download many educational apps from Google Play for your kids.

【New 12 System Kids Tablet】kids tablet is equipped with the latest Android 12 operating system with a quad core processor,2GB RAM, 32GB ROM, providing faster application response, smooth games and videos. Support micro SD card up to 128GB, provide more space to store photos, music, movies and videos.

【Parent Control Tablet for Kids】This 7 inch Tablet with parental control mode, parents can set separate profiles and account for kids.parents can set personal information and personal use time for each kid through control mode, and choose to use the appropriate apps and websites according to the kid's age.

【Tablet Case】The specially designed case protects your kid's tablet against dust, bumps and drops.An adjustable bracket, which allows kids to have a pleasant and relaxing experience without having to hold the tablet all the time while learning, watching.

【Great Gift for Kids】 Tablet is with kids mode, with cute picture style. No matter birthday or the holiday such as Easter Christmas or school supplies. this kids tablet will be a good choice for child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All in all, a very solid tablet for the price point
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. For being a tablet that's not one of the major producers, this is a solid device.Product came in solid packaging. Secure, no movement of interior pieces, and was housed within a solid plastic inner container. Nice screen protector over the screen for shipment. Everything opened easily and stays put together well for storage. Slim, compact bezel and profile on the tablet makes it nice to grip without a case. It took a few small tumbles without a case onto carpet without any damage.I have a number of tablets around the house, some name brand some not. This one performed as well, if not better, than most of the name brand ones that are of the same production year. The screen quality is good, displays videos both over wifi or storage without any visual artifacts, tearing, or delay. The wifi is solid, connects to both 2.4- and 5ghz. Bluetooth connected to multiple devices, including wireless speakers and earbuds, without any hiccups or issues. The front camera is good enough for video calls; the rear camera is great for the size.Performance was solid when pushing the tablet to the limits, both with processing image editing and with playing games on it. The battery life was good enough for short, intensive bursts of activity but also good enough to sit and read on for many hours without issue. My only complaint is the branded boot process which adds about an extra 10-15 seconds to the reset/boot time of the tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Great Price
reviews.reviewText: This product is a perfect size and easy to setup. It charges well and screen quality of great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Back came off with cover
reviews.reviewText: I tried to take the kid cover off and the whole back of the tablet came off with it. We lost the buttons immediately but snapped the back on and it worked for about a 12 hour drive (THANKFULLY). However after that the battery ran out and it's never charged or turned on again. I missed our return window by about 3 days. (I bought it when there was a coupon and kept it in the box till closer to my kiddos birthday.) So that super sucks. What a waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for our 5 year old and she loves it. Works good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good condition and packaging
reviews.reviewText: So far, my grandson (5 year old) is enjoying the tablet. My one complaint is I purchased it as new and somehow there are THREE random photos in the photo gallery of what looks like instructions in Chinese from July 2023.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the size of the tablet. I had been looking for a nice one at a good price. The graphics are great and I like the colors. Easy to work and download apps to use on it. I like watching u-tube and playing games. I would highly recommend this to someone looking for a great deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lville, best Android table I have ever had, slim, unique, and yet very powerful device.
reviews.reviewText: I saw this tablet the first time in my daughter’s hands when it got my attention with its unique design extra clear display and clear sound.I found it has much bigger value than its price. Immediately I ordered mine, started using it on daily basis side by side with my laptop. To my surprise I found myself spending more time with the table than the laptop. I became overwhelmed with this tablet enjoying the wonderful features of Android 13, large memory which I can extend with TF when needed. I am totally satisfied with the awesome large screen, fast browsing, Bluetooth connectivity, vivid colors, stereo sound, long lasting battery charge, light weigh that makes very handy and easy to use in different places.I strongly recommend Lville P11 tablet to everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a great buy
reviews.reviewText: Full volume is almost mute. Can barely hear anything on this thing. Also, it is SUPER slow. Takes a good while to boot up. Would never buy this again.
